data:
Homophones

A homophone is a word that sounds like another word, but has a different spelling and meaning

  • A while - Awhile

  • Accent - Ascent

  • Adapt - Adopt

  • Advice - Advise

  • Ail - Ale

  • Air - Heir

  • Allowed - Aloud

  • Altar - Alter

  • Amend - Emend

  • Appraise - Apprise

  • Arc - Ark

  • Ate - Eight

  • Ate - Eight
